title: Neon Neon - Stainless style (2008)
description: Only in the eccentric minds of Gruff Rhys (Super Furry Animals) and electro stalwart Boom Bip (otherwise known as BryanHollon) could a concept album about the life and times of John DeLorean become a fully-fledged musical reality. Featuring collaborations with Spank Rock, Yo Majesty and, bizarrely, The Magic Numbers, &#039;Stainless Style&#039; is a hook-laden science-fiction odyssey, referencing Star Wars and myriad 80s influences, while retaining the pop sensibility of Gruff Rhys&#039; projects and the innovation of Boom Bip&#039;s. Includes the single &#039;I Lust You&#039;, featuring Cate Le Bon
